Detailed Description

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
class stDFGlobalRep< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >

This class defines all behavior of the GR.
Date
2005/03/08 19:43:09
Author:
Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvieira@icmc.usp.br)

Joselene Marques (joselene@icmc.usp.br)
